sources.title: .","It is characterized by five essential characteristics defined by NIST: on-demand self-service, b
sources.snippet: .","It is characterized by five essential characteristics defined by NIST: on-demand self-service, broad network access, resource pooling, rapid elasticity, and measured service

sources.title: .","Cloud computing enables users to access computing resources over the internet without managing t
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing enables users to access computing resources over the internet without managing the underlying physical infrastructure

sources.title: .","The main types of cloud computing services are Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a
sources.snippet: .","The main types of cloud computing services are Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS)

sources.title: .","Cloud deployment models include public cloud, private cloud, hybrid cloud, and community cloud
sources.snippet: .","Cloud deployment models include public cloud, private cloud, hybrid cloud, and community cloud

sources.title: .","Cloud computing resources are pooled to serve multiple consumers using a multi-tenant model, wit
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing resources are pooled to serve multiple consumers using a multi-tenant model, with resources dynamically assigned and reassigned according to demand

sources.title: .","Rapid elasticity allows cloud resources to be elastically provisioned and released to scale rapi
sources.snippet: .","Rapid elasticity allows cloud resources to be elastically provisioned and released to scale rapidly outward and inward commensurate with demand, often appearing unlimited to the consumer

sources.title: .","Measured service means cloud systems automatically control and optimize resource use by leveragi
sources.snippet: .","Measured service means cloud systems automatically control and optimize resource use by leveraging metering capabilities, providing transparency for both provider and consumer

sources.title: .","Cloud computing supports broad network access, allowing access through standard mechanisms from
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing supports broad network access, allowing access through standard mechanisms from heterogeneous thin or thick client platforms such as mobile phones, tablets, laptops, and workstations

sources.title: .","Cloud computing works by users accessing cloud applications via the internet (front end), which
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing works by users accessing cloud applications via the internet (front end), which communicate with backend databases, servers, and computers managed by the cloud provider

sources.title: .","Performance metrics in cloud computing include resource utilization, latency, throughput, availa
sources.snippet: .","Performance metrics in cloud computing include resource utilization, latency, throughput, availability, and scalability

sources.title: .","Cloud computing supports a pay-per-use pricing model, helping organizations lower operating cost
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing supports a pay-per-use pricing model, helping organizations lower operating costs and scale resources as needed

sources.title: .","Cloud computing enables remote work, omnichannel customer engagement, and supports advanced tech
sources.snippet: .","Cloud computing enables remote work, omnichannel customer engagement, and supports advanced technologies such as AI and quantum computing
